content.query:
CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW dbo.stats_region
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = HASH(région),
    CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
)
AS
SELECT 
        c.région,
    SUM(ISNULL(v.montant, 0)) AS total_ventes,
    COUNT_BIG(v.montant) AS cnt,
    c.région AS region
FROM dbo.ventes v
JOIN dbo.clients c 
    ON v.id_client = c.id_client
GROUP BY c.région;

SELECT * FROM dbo.stats_region;
